Low_UV_levels,_no_need_for_special_prote: Amaleveli e-UV aphansi, asikho isidingo sokuvikelwa okukhethekile lapho ungaphandle.
There_is_a_moderate_risk_from_UV_rays._S: Kukhona ingozi emaphakathi evela emisebeni ye-UV. Kunconywa izibuko zelanga kanye nokuvikela ilanga.
UV_rays_are_highly_intense._You_should_l: Imisebe ye-UV inamandla kakhulu. Kufanele ukhawulele ukuphuma phakathi nosuku, sebenzisa izingubo zokuzivikela, izibuko zelanga, nokuvikela ilanga.
The_risk_from_UV_rays_is_very_high._Incr: Ingozi evela emisebeni ye-UV iphezulu kakhulu. Khulisa izindlela zokuzivikela ezinjengokugqoka isigqoko esinomphetho obanzi, ukusebenzisa isikrini selanga se-SPF esiphezulu, nokufuna umthunzi lapho ungaphandle.
UV_rays_are_extremely_dangerous._Avoid_g: Imisebe ye-UV iyingozi kakhulu. Gwema ukuphuma ngaphandle ngalesi sikhathi uma kungenzeka, futhi uma kufanele uphume, thatha zonke izinyathelo zokuzivikela.

Air_quality_is_satisfactory_and_poses_li: Ikhwalithi yomoya iyanelisa futhi ibeka ingozi encane noma ayinazo nhlobo
Sensitive_individuals_should_avoid_outdo: Abantu abazwelayo kufanele bagweme umsebenzi wangaphandle njengoba bangase babe nezimpawu zokuphefumula.
General_public_and_sensitive_individuals: Abantu abajwayelekile kanye nabantu abazwelayo ikakhulukazi basengozini yokuthola ukucasuka kanye nezinkinga zokuphefumula.
Increased_likelihood_of_adverse_effects_: Amathuba akhulayo okuba nemiphumela emibi kanye nokwanda kwenhliziyo namaphaphu phakathi komphakathi jikelele.
General_public_will_be_noticwably_affect: Umphakathi jikelele uzothinteka ngokuphawulekayo. Amaqembu azwelayo kufanele akhawulele imisebenzi yangaphandle.
General_public_at_high_risk_of_experienc: Umphakathi jikelele osengozini enkulu yokuthola ukucasuka okunamandla kanye nemiphumela emibi enempilo. Kufanele igweme imisebenzi yangaphandle.
Air_quality_is_acceptable._However,_ther: Ikhwalithi yomoya yamukelekile. Nokho, kungase kube nengozi kwabanye abantu, ikakhulukazi labo abazwela ngokungavamile ukungcoliswa komoya.
Unusually_sensitive_people_should_consid: Abantu abazwela ngokungavamile kufanele bacabangele ukunciphisa ukuzikhandla okude noma okukhulu.
PM2.5_particles_are_small_enough_to_ente: Izinhlayiya ze-PM2.5 zincane ngokwanele ukuthi zingangena egazini futhi ngokuvamile zibangelwa imililo yequbula, umlotha wentuthu, amagciwane noma izinhlayiya zothuli.
We_want_to_make_sure_you_have_the_best_e: Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi unolwazi olungcono kakhulu ngenkathi usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza
Members_of_sensitive_groups_may_experien: Amalungu amaqembu azwelayo angase abe nemiphumela yezempilo. Umphakathi jikelele mancane amathuba okuthi uthinteke.
Some_members_of_the_general_public_may_e: Amanye amalungu omphakathi jikelele angase abe nemiphumela yezempilo; amalungu amaqembu azwelayo angase abe nemiphumela emibi kakhulu yezempilo.
Health_alert:_The_risk_of_health_effects: Isexwayiso sezempilo: Ingozi yemiphumela yezempilo iyanda kuwo wonke umuntu.
Health_warning_of_emergency_conditions:_: Isixwayiso sezempilo sezimo eziphuthumayo: wonke umuntu kungenzeka ukuthi athinteke.
People_with_respiratory_or_heart_disease: Abantu abanesifo sokuphefumula noma senhliziyo, abantu abadala kanye nezingane kufanele banciphise ukuzikhandla isikhathi eside.
Abantu abanesifo sokuphefumula noma senhliziyo, asebekhulile kanye nezingane kufanele bagweme ukuzikhandla isikhathi eside; wonke umuntu kufanele anciphise ukuzikhandla okude.
Abantu abanesifo sokuphefumula noma senhliziyo, asebekhulile kanye nezingane kufanele bagweme noma yimuphi umsebenzi wangaphandle; wonke umuntu kufanele agweme ukuzikhandla isikhathi eside.
Everyone_should_avoid_any_outdoor_exerti: Wonke umuntu kufanele agweme noma yikuphi ukuzikhandla kwangaphandle; abantu abanesifo sokuphefumula noma senhliziyo, abantu abadala kanye nezingane kufanele bahlale ezindlini.
Ozone_in_the_air_we_breathe_can_harm_our: I-ozone esemoyeni esiwuphefumulayo ingalimaza impilo yethu, ikakhulukazi ngezinsuku ezishisayo lapho i-ozone ingafinyelela amazinga angenampilo. Ngisho namazinga aphansi e-ozone angabangela imiphumela yezempilo.
Sulfur_dioxide_irritates_the_skin_and_mu: I-sulphur dioxide ihlukumeza isikhumba nolwelwesi lwamafinyila lwamehlo, ikhala, umphimbo namaphaphu. Ukugxila okuphezulu kwe-SO2 kungabangela ukuvuvukala nokucasuka kwesistimu yokuphefumula, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi sokusebenza kanzima komzimba.
The_main_health_effect_of_nitrogen_dioxi: Umthelela omkhulu wezempilo we-nitrogen dioxide usesimiso sokuphefumula. Ukuhogela izingane nge-nitrogen dioxide kwandisa ingozi yazo yokutheleleka ngokuphefumula futhi kungase kuholele ekusebenzeni kabi kwamaphaphu lapho sezikhulile.
Breathing_air_with_a_high_concentration_: Umoya ophefumulayo onokugxiliswa okuphezulu kwe-CO kunciphisa inani lomoya-mpilo ongathuthwa emgudwini wegazi uye ezithweni ezibalulekile njengenhliziyo nobuchopho. Emazingeni aphezulu kakhulu, okungenzeka ngaphakathi endlini noma kwezinye izindawo ezivalekile, i-CO ingabangela isiyezi, ukudideka, ukuquleka nokufa.
Exposure_to_high_levels_of_lead_may_caus: Ukuchayeka emazingeni aphezulu omthofu kungase kubangele i-anemia, ubuthakathaka, nokulimala kwezinso nobuchopho. Ukuchayeka okuphezulu kakhulu komthofu kungadala ukufa.
High_levels_of_ammonia_can_irritate_and_: Amazinga aphezulu e-ammonia angacasula futhi ashise isikhumba, umlomo, umphimbo, amaphaphu, namehlo. Amazinga aphezulu kakhulu e-ammonia angalimaza amaphaphu noma abangele ukufa.
PM10_particles_are_small_enough_to_get_i: Izinhlayiya ze-PM10 zincane ngokwanele ukuthi zingangena emphinjeni nasemaphashini akho. Amazinga aphezulu e-PM10 angakwenza ukhwehlele, ikhala lakho ligijime futhi amehlo alume.
